Title: Maleant Data Systems Solutions
Writer: Donick Cary, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: The Pied Piper guys struggle to phone it in; Erlich faces competition; Monica takes a stand; Gavin makes a decision about Nucleus.
